name: Maison Kanraku: The Second Climax
description:
Genre: Post-Coital Tactical Espionage Action

Tokyo, 2015 A.D.

The First Climax is released.

We are the Alpha and the Omega. The world will never be the same…

Maison Kanraku is a NEC PC-Engine style panty-throwing simulator. Experience the high resolution of thrown-away pixelated panties as they distract an army of conservative landladies and janitors.

XInput compatible gamepad

Controls:

Space or Up: Jump / A: Throw Panty / S: Run

Escape: Change character

The Holy Tchatchaga Games Combo:
Loic Duboux – Lead Game Design / Level Design
Nicolas Schluchter – Lead Programmer
Matthieu Pellet – Concept Art / Character Design
David Javet – Level Design / Game Design

Gudi Guru - Music
Seiko Annie Rubattel – Backgrounds
Stéphanie Etienne – Interface

First Made during the Global Game Jam 2015

Check out the Tchagata Youtube Channel

And our website: http://tchagata.com/
